availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Aaron Cline (Hickman County, Kentucky, grocer and tavern keeper)

body.p: Hickman County, Kentucky, grocer and tavern keeper. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Tichel in Fulton County, Kentucky, on May 17, 1849. Father of Sarah C. Cline, Albert Cline, Susan F. Cline, Joel B. Cline, Martha Cline, Victoria Cline, and Ellen M. Cline. Farmer in Obion County, Tennessee, in 1850. Grocer in Moscow, Hickman County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Obion County, District 2, p. 352B-353A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Moscow, p. 442.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Fulton County Marriages, Film #000321403, p. 184.
